name: Hatha Yoga
description: A gentle, foundational style focusing on basic poses and breathing—great for beginners.

name: Ashtanga Yoga
description: A structured, physically demanding series of poses. Builds strength and discipline.

name: Power Yoga
description: A fast-paced, fitness-based style inspired by Ashtanga. Great for strength and cardio.

name: Iyengar Yoga
description: Focuses on precision, alignment, and the use of props (blocks, straps). Good for injury prevention.

name: Yin Yoga
description: Slow, deep stretching with poses held for long periods. Targets connective tissues.

name: Restorative Yoga
description: Very gentle, relaxing, and supported postures—ideal for stress relief and recovery.

name: Kundalini Yoga
description: Combines movement, breathwork, chanting, and meditation to awaken energy.

name: Bikram / Hot Yoga
description: 26-posture sequence practiced in a heated room to increase flexibility and detoxification.

name: Prenatal Yoga
description: Designed specifically for pregnant women—safe poses, breathing, and relaxation.

name: Yoga Nidra
description: Guided meditation for deep rest and mental relaxation.

name: Chair Yoga
description: Adaptive yoga done using a chair—great for seniors or those with limited mobility.

name: Aerial Yoga
description: Yoga performed with the support of a hammock or silk suspended from the ceiling.

name: Acro Yoga
description: Partner-based yoga combining acrobatics and Thai massage elements.

name: Jivamukti Yoga
description: Blend of physical practice, music, spirituality, and philosophy.
